Ok, am I missing something here.  This is from the drive up at Duncan Donuts in Tucson, Arizona. They sell donuts right. The donut section on menu at the drive-up is about a 10% of the total screen.  Help me out here, all my marketing friends.  If donuts is over 80% of their sales why would the menu on the drive-up basically hide the donuts options.

Edgar Noriega
Motion Graphics Artist at Gate6
October 30, 2015, Edgar worked with Christopher in the same group

Edgar is so talented, his skills are vast and he can do pretty much everything very well. From video post production to 3D rendering, to art direction of various in-house productions, Edgar can get it done. He is kind and easy to work with but will always tell you how to improve your work and he balances that very well. I have really enjoyed getting to know him and you should too. "Good Job Chatree."

summary: Christopher Sample is a American writer, designer, illustrator, and photographer. http://studiolxv.comChristopher has worked with brands such as La Locanda Ristorante Italiano, Desoto Central Market, Sobas, Cold Stone Creamery, Blimpie, Samurai Sam's, America's Taco Shop, and Goodwill with Park&Co. Christopher has a passion for launching brands and small businesses​ whenever he has the opportunity.Studying Graphic Design at the Art Institute of Phoenix graduating with a Bachelors of the Arts in '08. Christopher loves backpacking, margherita pizza, and the great outdoors — say hello.
